abstract: Stephane Aquin, new chief curator at Smithsonian’s Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden, hopes his outsider perspective as Canadian will help transform America’s national museum of modern art into institution with international appeal.
lead_paragraph: Stéphane Aquin, a Canadian, is the new guardian at America’s national museum of modern art, where impact and vision, rather than dollars and bodies, may be the measure of his success.

headline.main: Hirshhorn Museum’s New Curator Brings a Different Perspective

snippet: Stéphane Aquin, a Canadian, is the new guardian at America’s national museum of modern art, where impact and vision, rather than dollars and bodies, may be the measure of his success.
